author: Martyn Landi
title: Apple and Google ‚Äòshould face investigation over mobile browser duopoly‚Äô | The Independent
text: The mobile browser market in the UK is not working well for businesses and consumers and Apple and Google should be investigated further by the competition watchdog, an initial inquiry has said.The Competition and Markets Authority‚Äôs (CMA) independent inquiry group carried out an in-depth assessment of the mobile browser markets, and has raised concerns about how Apple controls how mobile web browsers work on its devices.The CMA opened its investigation after its own market study, published in 2021, found Apple and Google have an effective duopoly on mobile ecosystems, across operating systems, app stores and web browsers on mobile devices, which it said meant the two companies were in a position to effectively set the rules on how mobile browsers work on their respective devices.Through our investigation, we have provisionally found that competition between different mobile browsers is not working well and this is holding back innovation in the UKThe independent inquiry group‚Äôs initial inquiry found that Apple‚Äôs rules in this area restrict competitors from being able to deliver new and innovative features to consumers.It said concerns had been raised by other browser providers, who said that they are unable to offer a full range of features because of how Apple‚Äôs iOS and App Store operate.In addition, it said Apple and Google can manipulate how users are presented with choices about which web browser to use on their devices to make their own browsers the clearest or easiest option.As a result, the group has recommended that the CMA prioritises investigating Apple and Google‚Äôs activities in mobile ecosystems under new digital markets competition rules coming into force next year.Margot Daly, chairwoman of the CMA‚Äôs independent inquiry group, said: ‚ÄúMarkets work best when rival businesses are able to develop and bring innovative options to consumers.‚ÄúThrough our investigation, we have provisionally found that competition between different mobile browsers is not working well and this is holding back innovation in the UK.‚ÄúThe analysis set out in this report and a range of potential interventions considered to address the market issues identified by the group merits consideration by the CMA board under its new powers, which have been specifically designed for digital markets.‚ÄúUnder those new powers, the CMA can consider the case for designating firms with strategic market status, taking account of the interplay between the specific markets that are the subject of this market investigation and Apple‚Äôs and Google‚Äôs wider mobile ecosystems.‚ÄùElsewhere, the group had also looked at the mobile cloud gaming market in the UK, but found that there was no need for the CMA to intervene at this time.

author: Editorial Mediotiempo
title: ¬°Todo un espect√°culo! As√≠ se vieron las auroras boreales en M√©xico | FOTOS
text: ¬°Todo un espect√°culo! As√≠ se vieron las auroras boreales en M√©xico | FOTOS El norte de nuestro pa√≠s fue el afortunado en poder presenciar este show natural que pocas veces se ve. Un fen√≥meno natural pocas veces visto en M√©xico se disfrut√≥ este jueves 10 de octubre y se podr√° seguir nuevamente este viernes 11. Se trata de las [auroras boreales](https://www.mediotiempo.com/otros-mundos/auroras-boreales-vuelven-mexico-ciudades-visibles?utm_cmp_rs=Nota%20Enlace%20Editorial). Y es que se trata de un verdadero espect√°culo que muy extra√±amente sucede en nuestro pa√≠s, por lo que las redes sociales se han inundado de estas bonitas im√°genes, donde el cielo se ti√±e de colores. ¬øPor qu√© se ven las auroras boreales en M√©xico? De acuerdo al Observatorio de Din√°mica Solar de la NASA, en los √∫ltimos d√≠as el Sol emiti√≥ la llamarada solar m√°s poderosa en casi una d√©cada, catalogada como la m√°s grande de su ciclo y que dura 11 a√±os, por una explosi√≥n de la mancha solar AR3842. La potente erupci√≥n X7.1 que se dio el 1¬∫ de octubre desat√≥ una eyecci√≥n de masa coronal, una columna de plasma y un campo magn√©tico que se dirigen a la Tierra. Estas eyecciones son definidas como explosiones de plasma y campos magn√©ticos de la corona solar que generan tormentas el√©ctricas en el planeta tierra que pueden generar auroras boreales. ¬øEn qu√© estados se ver√°n? Ser√° el norte del pa√≠s el m√°s afortunado para este fen√≥meno natural, e incluso donde m√°s se ha visto ha sido en Sonora (desierto), [Nuevo Le√≥n](https://www.mediotiempo.com/futbol/liga-mx/sergio-canales-y-su-gran-acto-benefico-a-una-casa-hogar-en-nuevo-leon?utm_cmp_rs=Nota%20Enlace%20Editorial) (Iturbide) y Chihuahua (Buenaventura, Balleza y Jumiles). Otros pa√≠ses como Ucrania, Australia, Dinamarca, Rusia, Gran Breta√±a, Canad√°, Pa√≠ses Bajos y partes de [Estados Unidos](https://www.mediotiempo.com/otros-mundos/precio-del-dolar-hoy-10-de-octubre-2024-asi-va-el-peso-en-mexico-al-momento?utm_cmp_rs=Nota%20Enlace%20Editorial) y Espa√±a tambi√©n pudieron presenciar el espect√°culo.

author: CMS Medios
title: C√©sar Bono confirma que ha perdido la movilidad de una mano; este es su estado de salud
text:
C√©sar Bono confirma que ha perdido la movilidad de una mano
El actor C√©sar Bono ha aceptado que su mano izquierda ya no podr√° moverse y habl√≥ con la prensa sobre la posibilidad de mudarse en el futuro a una instituci√≥n dedicada a brindar refugio
El actor C√©sar Bono ha aceptado que su mano izquierda ya no podr√° moverse. Con 74 a√±os, bromea diciendo que su mano "muri√≥ antes que √©l" y no descarta la posibilidad de mudarse alg√∫n d√≠a a La Casa del Actor.
Explic√≥ que su terapeuta le inform√≥ que no podr√° recuperar la movilidad de su mano izquierda, pero a√∫n es independiente. No obstante, admiti√≥ que por las noches el dolor que experimenta en su cuerpo es bastante intenso.
"Llevo una vida normal de ba√±arme, trabajar todos los d√≠as, llega la noche y la mitad de todo mi cuerpo est√° cansada de cargar con la otra mitad del cuerpo, la que no funciona; en el d√≠a es molesto, pero en la noche ya son dolores fuertes", confes√≥.
C√©sar Bono, conocido por su papel de Frankie Rivers en la serie "Vecinos", vive con uno de sus hijos, pero aclar√≥ que m√°s que apoyarse mutuamente, se comportan como "roomies", es decir, compa√±eros de cuarto.
En 2018, el actor sufri√≥ ocho infartos, entre ellos uno al miocardio y ocho cerebrales, lo que afect√≥ gravemente su salud y movilidad.
C√©sar Bono no descarta vivir en La casa del Actor
Despu√©s de la presentaci√≥n de las temporadas 18 y 19 de la serie "Vecinos", C√©sar Bono habl√≥ con la prensa sobre la posibilidad de mudarse en el futuro a La Casa del Actor, una instituci√≥n dedicada a brindar refugio y apoyo a actores veteranos y adultos mayores del √°mbito art√≠stico en M√©xico.
Para el protagonista de "Defendiendo al cavern√≠cola", vivir all√≠ es una opci√≥n, no porque no pueda costearse sus alimentos, sino porque lo considera como una forma de no incomodar a su familia.
"No por la cuesti√≥n de que me mantengan en cuanto a los alimentos, yo lo pens√© en cuanto a no darle lata a la familia", expres√≥.
Precis√≥ que tal vez cuando ya no pueda ir solo al ba√±o podr√≠a considerar irse a vivir al lugar inaugurado por el comediante mexicano Mario Moreno, "Cantinflas", en 1944.
"Claro que s√≠, el d√≠a que no pueda ir al ba√±o; yo ah√≠ presentaba mis ex√°menes, es m√°s, hay una butaca que dice C√©sar Bono que yo la don√©", record√≥.
En 2022, al actor se le detect√≥ una √∫lcera estomacal que provoc√≥ una hemorragia, lo que requiri√≥ hospitalizaci√≥n y un cambio de sonda biliar.
En julio de 2024 Bono reconoci√≥ sus problemas de salud, pero tambi√©n su claridad mental para poder seguir trabajando.
"¬øC√≥mo estoy de salud? De movilidad ya vieron que muy afectado. Yo perd√≠ la mitad del cuerpo con una hemiplej√≠a. Tuve un accidente cardiovascular, fueron ocho infartos en una sola noche. Me fui a dormir sin ning√∫n malestar, ning√∫n s√≠ntoma, y al d√≠a siguiente ya nada m√°s me funcionaba la mitad del cuerpo, que sigue estando as√≠. Esta mano -se√±ala la izquierda- ahora s√≠ que est√° de adorno, est√° esp√°stica. Pero de aqu√≠ -la cabeza- estoy bien, mi coraz√≥n est√° bien y mientras eso pase, voy a seguir en esto porque esta es mi pasi√≥n", expresa entonces el actor.
C√©sar Bono se cas√≥ y se divorci√≥ dos veces, de sus matrimonios tiene cuatro hijos, dos mujeres y dos hombres.
"Hoy pido que mis hijos sean m√°s felices que yo. Y le he dicho a Dios que, si hay planes tr√°gicos en la familia, me sucedan a m√≠, no a mis hijos", dijo en su momento.
MF

Todo lo que necesitas saber para comenzar tu d√≠a
Registrarse implica aceptar los T√©rminos y Condiciones

author: Pete Tomkies
title: Adobe enrages photographers with its latest ad campaign - Videomaker
text: Adobe‚Äôs latest ad campaign running on social media channels has annoyed a lot of photographers. [Reported by PetaPixel](https://petapixel.com/2024/05/03/adobe-throws-photographers-under-the-bus-again-skip-the-photoshoot/), the advert was intended to raise awareness of Photoshop‚Äôs new generative AI capabilities. What does the advert say? Adobe‚Äôs advert highlights Photoshop‚Äôs Generate Background feature. It shows a perfume bottle against a plain background and then an AI-generated background with orchids and oranges. However, it‚Äôs the caption with the image that has caused the problems. It says ‚ÄúSkip the photoshoot with Generate Background. Add or replace a background that matches the lighting, shadows, and perspective of your subject in fewer steps, right from the Contextual Task Bar.‚Äù Skip the photoshoot Photographer, director, and artist Clayton Cubitt [shared the advert on X](https://twitter.com/claytoncubitt/status/1784665281702318386?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1784665281702318386%7Ctwgr%5E37cacdb0339ea0754d857c04d9eebe881f1 %7Ctwcon%5Es1_&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fpetapixel.com%2F2024%2F05%2F03%2Fadobe-throws-photographers-under-the-bus-again-skip-the-photoshoot%2F). Cubitt commented, ‚ÄúSo glad as a photographer I‚Äôve given Adobe tens of thousands of dollars only to have it pivot to selling ‚Äòskip the photo shoot.‚Äô‚Äù Graphic designer Brian Winkeler also shared Cubitt‚Äôs post [on LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/posts/brianwinkeler_skip-the-photoshoot-what-will-adobe-activity-7190552395179778048-NQiN/). Winkeler wrote, ‚Äú‚ÄòSkip the photoshoot.‚Äô What will Adobe be telling customers to skip next? And when will their consumer message fully devolve down to ‚ÄòSkip all experts?‚Äô‚Äù Word choice [A post on The Nerdy Photographer website](https://nerdyphotographer.com/gear/adobe-firefly-ai-ads/) was also critical of Adobe‚Äôs advert. It reads ‚ÄúReally, Adobe? You‚Äôre telling folks to ‚Äòskip the photoshoot?‚Äô This isn‚Äôt about not using AI to enhance images, because that is here to stay and has already been a part of your image editing workflow for a while now, they‚Äôre just calling it AI now. No! This is about word choice. They could have chosen copy that reads ‚ÄòEnhance your photoshoot‚Äô or ‚ÄòGet more from your photoshoot‚Äô instead of ‚ÄòSKIP THE PHOTOSHOOT.‚Äô‚Äù What has Adobe said? PetaPixel contacted Adobe for a comment on the advert. However, Adobe‚Äôs response didn‚Äôt specifically address the concerns of the photographers. Adobe told PetaPixel, ‚ÄúEvery massive technology shift offers opportunities to deliver new innovations for our customers, and we are focused on harnessing the power of generative AI to amplify human creativity and expression, not replace it‚Äù. In addition, Adobe said, ‚ÄúThese latest innovations empower professionals with tools that eliminate mundane tasks, so they are freed up to focus on bringing their visions to life more easily and work more productively.‚Äù What we think Many of the concerns around generative AI have been that it will start to take work away from artists and creators. Unfortunately, Adobe‚Äôs latest advert appears to openly state that as a positive thing. There will be some who say that the photographers are being oversensitive. However, Adobe‚Äôs ‚ÄúSkip the Photoshoot‚Äù advert is aimed at businesses that would have to commission a photographer. There will be marketing teams looking at the ad and thinking that they can save money by using AI instead. Hopefully Adobe will be more sensitive and supportive of its customer base in the future.

author: ABCNews
title: Nikki Haley expands on Civil War comment after she did not cite slavery as a cause for the war
text:
The questioner told Haley it was "astonishing" she gave an answer that did not mention slavery.
Republican presidential candidate Nikki Haley on Thursday addressed the backlash to her
[Wednesday night comments](/nikki-haley-doesnt-cite-slavery-as-civil-war-cause-after-question-/14233575/) about what she thought was the cause of the American Civil War, during which she notably did not cite slavery as a cause, sparking criticism.
"Of course, the Civil War was about slavery," said Haley at a Thursday town hall in New Hampshire. "We know that. That's unquestioned. Always the case. We know the Civil War was about slavery."
Haley continued to elaborate, telling the crowd that the war was about more than that.
"It was about the freedoms of every individual," she said. "It was about the role of the government. For 80 years, America had the decision and the moral question of whether slavery was a good thing and whether government economically, culturally, any other reasons, had a role to play in. By the grace of God, we did the right thing and slavery is no more. But the lessons of what the bigger issue with the Civil War is that let's not forget what came out of that, which is government's role, individual liberties, freedom for every single person, freedom of speech, freedom of religion, freedom to do and be anything you want to be without anyone in government getting in our way."
Haley said that she believes everyone deserves to be a free individual
Her comments were prompted by an
[audience question](nikki-haley-doesnt-cite-slavery-as-civil-war-cause-after-question-/14233575/) about what Haley thought the war was about.
The Republican candidate first turned the question around on the person who posed it.
"What do you think the cause of the Civil War was?" she asked, to which the questioner responded by saying, "I'm not running for president."
Haley then stated: "I think it always comes down to the role of government and what the rights of the people are. And we will always stand by the fact that I think the government was intended to secure the rights and freedoms of the people," Haley said. "It was never meant to be all things to all people. Government doesn't need to tell you how to live your life. They don't need to tell you what you can and can't do. They don't need to be a part of your life. They need to make sure that you have freedom."
The questioner told Haley it was "astonishing" she gave an answer that did not mention slavery.
"What do you want me to say about slavery?" she responded before pivoting and asking for the next question.
In a radio interview with The Pulse of NH on Thursday, she claimed the questioner was "definitely a Democrat plant."
"That's why I said: 'What does it mean to you?' And if you notice, he didn't answer anything," she said.
Critics accused Haley of refusing to mention slavery, saying her description of the Civil War is whitewashing U.S. history.
"Haley's refusal to admit that the Civil War was rooted in slavery last night in Berlin is just the latest of her shameful attempts to whitewash our country's history," said New Hampshire Democratic Party Chair Ray Buckley. "From defending the Confederate flag and leaders to equating Black History Month with Confederate History Month, Haley's record bowing to the extreme fringes of the MAGA base speaks volumes and is yet another reason why New Hampshire voters will reject her next year."
President Joe Biden responded to Haley's comments on X, formerly known as Twitter, stating simply: "It was about slavery."
A senior Biden adviser expanded on the comment to ABC News.
"It doesn't take a PhD to understand that slavery was the central cause of the civil war, but instead of telling it like it is, the entire MAGA field from Donald Trump on down are pandering to the most extreme fringe of their base. Minimize slavery, paraphrase HITLER, punish women and doctors - quite the record heading into the general election that will be the most diverse in history," the adviser said.
As a former South Carolina governor, Haley has long been under scrutiny for her views of the Confederacy's place in American history.
On the campaign trail, she has repeatedly invoked the memory of her 2015 calls for the removal of the Confederate flag from the South Carolina State House grounds. The call followed a racially motivated mass shooting at a Charleston church that left nine Black people dead.
"For many people in our state, the flag stands for traditions that are noble: traditions of history, of heritage, of ancestry," said Haley in a speech calling for its removal. She later continued, "At the same time, for many others in South Carolina, the flag is a deeply offensive symbol of a brutally oppressive past."

author: Field Level Media
title: Browns WR Amari Cooper (heel) out vs. Jets
text: Four days after one of the best games of his career, wide receiver Amari Cooper will sit out when the Cleveland Browns face the visiting New York Jets on Thursday. Cooper had been bothered by a heel injury and did not practice during the short week. He was officially considered questionable entering the day, but he was on the list when the Browns declared their inactives 90 minutes before kickoff. Cooper caught 11 passes for a career-high and franchise-record 265 yards to go with two touchdowns in Sunday's 36-22 win over the Houston Texans. He had a 53-yard reception on the first play of the game and later scored on a 75-yard catch. The Browns will be missing a four-time Pro Bowler who has recorded a career-best 1,250 receiving yards in his ninth season in the league and his second in Cleveland. Thursday will be Cooper's first time missing a game in two years with the Browns. The Browns also made kicker Dustin Hopkins (left hamstring) and punter Corey Bojorquez (left quad) inactive. They are set to roll with Riley Patterson at kicker and Matt Haack at punter after elevating both specialists from the practice squad to the active roster. The Jets made veteran wide receiver Allen Lazard inactive due to an illness. Jets kicker Greg Zuerlein, who was being monitored for right quad tightness, is active. --Field Level Media Originally published on [fieldlevelmedia.com](https://fieldlevelmedia.com), part of the [BLOX Digital Content Exchange](https://www.bloxdigital.com/products_services/cen/).

author: Trey Luerssen
title: Arch Manning officially named Texas Longhorns starting QB for Saturday
text:
Texas Longhorns coach Steve Sarkisian has announced Arch Manning will start at quarterback against UL Monroe at DKR on Saturday night. Sark says Ewers continues to improve and will rest this week.
Manning replaced Quinn Ewers after a 2nd quarter oblique injury against UTSA and accounted for five touchdowns, which included a 67-yard touchdown run and a 75-yard TD pass to WR Ryan Wingo. This was the first time in Longhorns history a player recorded a run and throw of at least 65 yards in the same game. Only Colt McCoy and Vince Young had done it in the same season for Texas, according to ESPN .
‚ÄúArch is more than capable, as I think we all know. I mean, you go out and you have five touchdowns coming in off the bench, you‚Äôve already proved you can play. Now, it‚Äôs about executing the plan, doing it with confidence and fixing some of the issues on the field when they arise.‚Äù ‚Äî Steve Sarkisian
Let‚Äôs ride ü§ò @ArchManning pic.twitter.com/MzmCBnYi75
‚Äî Texas Football (@TexasFootball) September 19, 2024
Sark says Ewers will continue treatment for his strained oblique and will be on the sideline supporting Manning and the rest of the team.
‚ÄúQuinn has made great strides ever since Saturday night into where he‚Äôs gotten to. But my decision is I‚Äôm looking forward to his future as a player, but also the future of the season for us. ‚Ä¶ And getting him possibly one more week healthier for the long term, I think, is good for us as we‚Äôre getting ready for SEC play. Quinn will obviously have an earpiece in. He‚Äôll hear every play call. Without question, his support of Arch is critical, and I don‚Äôt foresee anything different than that.‚Äù ‚Äî Steve Sarkisian
It sounds like the plan is for Ewers to only miss this weekend‚Äôs game. The Texas coach has told Ewers that a week off doesn‚Äôt change anything as far as who the Longhorns permanent starting quarterback will be.
‚ÄúAll the goals [Ewers] had and that we‚Äôve had for him coming into this season are all still there for him. I think we have a national championship-caliber team, and he‚Äôs the quarterback of that team. And I think we still have that in front of us to go do that. ‚Ä¶ This guy‚Äôs going to be in New York for the Heisman ‚Ä¶ and I think he has the ability to be a top-five NFL draft pick.‚Äù ‚Äî Steve Sarkisian.
Sarkisian says it will be different for Manning operating the game plan from the opening series rather than just being thrown into the game.

author: ektahospitaldeaddiction.zira
title: Zira Ekta Hospital: Your Beacon Of Hope At The Heart Of Punjab
text:
Welcome to Zira Ekta Hospital, where we believe in the power of compassion, dedication, and professional expertise to transform lives. As a trusted Nasha Mukti Kendra in Punjab , we understand the profound impact that addiction can have on individuals and their families. Our mission is to provide comprehensive and compassionate care to support our patients on their journey to sobriety and renewal, empowering them to build a brighter, healthier future.
Compassionate Care for Lasting Recovery
At Zira Ekta Hospital , we recognize that addiction is a complex and deeply personal struggle that requires individualized care and support. Our team of dedicated healthcare professionals is committed to providing compassionate, non-judgmental care to each and every patient who seeks our help. Here‚Äôs how we make a difference:
Personalized Treatment: We understand that addiction affects each person differently. That‚Äôs why we offer personalized treatment plans tailored to meet the unique needs and circumstances of our patients. From detoxification and medical stabilization to therapy and aftercare planning, we provide comprehensive care to support our patients at every stage of their recovery journey.
Expertise: Our Nasha Mukti Kendra is staffed by a multidisciplinary team of experts, including addiction specialists, psychiatrists, counselors, and nurses. With years of experience in the field of addiction treatment, our team is equipped to address the complex physical, psychological, and social aspects of addiction.
Holistic Approach: We believe in treating the whole person ‚Äì body, mind, and spirit. In addition to traditional therapies, we offer holistic approaches such as yoga, meditation, art therapy, and recreational activities to promote overall well-being and enhance the recovery process.
Supportive Environment: Our hospital provides a safe, supportive environment where patients can focus on their recovery free from judgment or stigma. We foster a sense of community and camaraderie among our patients, encouraging mutual support and understanding.
Your Partner in Sobriety
At Zira Ekta Hospital, we understand that the journey to sobriety can be challenging, but you don‚Äôt have to face it alone. Our Nasha Mukti Kendra is here to support you every step of the way, providing the guidance, encouragement, and resources you need to overcome addiction and live a fulfilling life. If you or a loved one is struggling with addiction, don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out. Contact us today to learn more about our programs and take the first step towards a brighter tomorrow with Zira Ekta Hospital by your side.

author: Guadeloupe La 1√®re avec AFP
title: Catastrophes naturelles : le co√ªt des assurances augmentera en 2025 - Guadeloupe la 1√®re
text:
Cette hausse g√©n√©rale, applicable au 1er janvier 2025, vise √† remettre √† flot un syst√®me en d√©ficit depuis 2015. Elle fera √©galement passer la surprime de 12% √† 20% pour les contrats d'assurance professionnelle, de 6% √† 9% celle sur les contrats vol et incendie, constituant ainsi une manne suppl√©mentaire de 1,2 milliard d'euros par an, selon le minist√®re de l'Economie.
Ce r√©gime, qui co√ªte en moyenne environ 25 euros par an et par foyer, passera " √† 41 euros " selon les calculs de Franck Le Vallois, directeur g√©n√©ral de France Assureurs, pour qui cette augmentation " remettra √† l'√©quilibre ", le dispositif.
La hausse des primes √©tait demand√©e par les professionnels depuis plusieurs mois. Face √† l'augmentation de la fr√©quence des temp√™tes, s√©cheresses et autres inondations dus au d√©r√®glement climatique, le r√©gime des catastrophes naturelles est d√©ficitaire depuis 2015.
En accordant une augmentation √† 20% sur la majorit√© des contrats en 2025, Bercy s'aligne √† peu pr√®s sur les recommandations de France Assureurs comme de la Caisse centrale de r√©assurance (CCR) qui pr√¥naient respectivement 18% et 19% d√®s 2024, la CCR en pr√©vision d'une hausse √† 22% dans le futur.
